title: 🎉 Welcome Messages
description:
Enabling this feature allows me to send a personalized welcome message to new members when they join your server

📝 **Settings**

:flying_disc: **Welcome Messages Channel:** Channel that I should send the welcome messages to new members
:flying_disc: **Welcome Messages:** Welcome messages that I will send to new members
:flying_disc: **Randomize:** Should I randomize the Welcome Message?
footer: • Use the command /report to tell me a bug

- `{member_count}`: The server's member count
